title: Blue
description: Blue. The color of devotion.  CARYS WOLFE is my heart. Mine, always. Leaving her nearly killed me. I thought it was the only way to keep her safe. She’s moved on, and I want her back.  § EVAN HART is my heart. Loving him is my destiny. I waited my entire life for our time, for us to finally be together, only to have him leave. Now he’s back. Though my mind can’t forgive him, my heart can’t forget.
author: S.M. West
